title: 432-450 Euclid, 1/1, Charming Cottage Style Townhome, Near Lake
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.
If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at
Photos are of a representative apartment in the building.
The currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured above.
432-450 Euclid, 1/1, Charming Cottage Style Townhome, Near Lake, $2,495.00
New Special Offer: $1000 Cash Bonus At Move In!
Total credit applied at Move in & Security Deposit fee waived!
Please contact leasing agent for more details.
For an Appointment to View, please contact: Mark mobile:
Cats Allowed (Extra deposit may be required), No Dogs
Just 1 block north of Lake Merritt!
Charming cottage style townhouse in a garden setting.
1920’s Mediterranean style courtyard and shared patio area.
Hardwood floors and great architectural details.
Property has shared central garden area
Cross Streets are Euclid Ave. and Burk St.
Close to casual carpool corner of Perkins and Grand Ave., and buses on Grand Ave.
Walk to BART, Lakeside Park, Lake Merritt
Walk to outstanding Grand Lake shopping area for restaurants, theater, coffee shops, bars, theater, shops, and Saturday Farmer's Market
Walk to Whole Foods Market and nearby Trader Joe's
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm
